name: part_009
file: tmp_【#癒月ちょこ3周年】３周年記念3D配信⚡重大告知あり！【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [spHKQDaz0C0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Yuzuki Choco introduces the 'Genkaika Meter' (Overload Meter) segment for her 3rd-anniversary stream.
Choco-sensei interviews Shiranui Flare and Shirogane Noel (Hololive 3rd Gen) about their relationship, causing her meter to rise.
Choco-sensei reflects on the 'te-te' (wholesome) interaction and prepares to introduce the next pair of guests.

subtitles.original: 限界化させてください。ということで...
subtitles.english: Please let me be overwhelmed. So...

subtitles.original: 挑戦者は4組！
subtitles.english: There are 4 pairs of challengers!

subtitles.original: 配信が終わるまでにチョコ先生を限界化させることができるのか？
subtitles.english: Will they be able to make Choco-sensei reach her limit by the end of the stream?

subtitles.original: そして、今回の企画のために...
subtitles.english: And, for this project...

subtitles.original: 限界化メーター
subtitles.english: Overload Meter

subtitles.original: じゃじゃーん！この限界化メーターをご用意いたしました！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Ta-da! We've prepared this Overload Meter! Yay!

subtitles.original: この限界化メーターは、私の限界化に向かうにつれて上昇していきます。
subtitles.english: This Overload Meter will rise as I get closer to my limit.

subtitles.original: なんと、マックスまで行くと、限界化！
subtitles.english: And if it reaches the max, I'll be overloaded!

subtitles.original: ということで、ミッションクリアとなります。
subtitles.english: That means the mission is cleared.

subtitles.original: それでは、早速行ってみましょう！
subtitles.english: Well then, let's get started right away!

subtitles.original: まずは、この方々！
subtitles.english: First, these people!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！チョコ先生！
subtitles.english: Yay! Choco-sensei!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！3周年おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Yay! Happy 3rd anniversary!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！そんなあなたたちのお名前は？
subtitles.english: Thank you! And what are your names?

subtitles.original: はい。え、今宵ホロライブ3期生の不知火フレアと...
subtitles.english: Yes. I'm Shiranui Flare of Hololive 3rd Generation tonight, and...

subtitles.original: ホロライブ3期生の白銀ノエルです！
subtitles.english: I'm Shirogane Noel of Hololive 3rd Generation!

subtitles.original: どてー！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Dotee! Yay!

subtitles.original: いや、チョコさん。ちょっとこの企画考えた時にね、お二人に一番最初にご連絡したんすよ。
subtitles.english: Actually, Choco-san... When I thought of this project, you two were the first ones I contacted.

subtitles.original: はい。え、嬉しい！ご連絡くれましたよね、結構前に。
subtitles.english: Yes. Ah, I'm so happy! You did contact us, quite a while ago.

subtitles.original: もうお二人のね、てぇてぇなお話し、エピソード、聞きたい、聞きたいと思って。
subtitles.english: I've been wanting and wanting to hear your 'te-te' stories and episodes.

subtitles.original: 聞かせてやー！
subtitles.english: Tell us!

subtitles.original: 何見とるんか？
subtitles.english: What are you looking at?

subtitles.original: いや、もうチョコ、噂はかねがねね、あの切り抜き動画とか色々、皆様の配信を見て聞いてたんですけど、
subtitles.english: Well, Choco has heard the rumors for a long time, from clip videos and watching everyone's streams,

subtitles.original: ちょっと直接お二人から聞きたいなーとか思っちゃったりして。
subtitles.english: but I thought I'd really like to hear them directly from you two.

subtitles.original: ノエルは一肌脱ごうか？フレア。
subtitles.english: Noel, shall we give it a try? Flare.

subtitles.original: 最近ね、会ったことね、あの裏で通話もしてるし、お出かけもしてるね、そういえば。
subtitles.english: Recently, we've met... we've been talking privately and even going out together, now that I think about it.

subtitles.original: そうだね。色々とお出かけもしてるし、二人で出かける？うん。
subtitles.english: That's right. We've been going out a lot, just the two of us? Yeah.

subtitles.original: お出かけしますよ。なんか、懐石食べに行ったね。
subtitles.english: We do. Like, we went to eat kaiseki.

subtitles.original: ああ、めっちゃ美味しかったね。個室？個室なの？それって。
subtitles.english: Oh, it was so delicious. A private room? Was it a private room?

subtitles.original: え？二人で懐石？個室で二人で懐石行くの？えっ？
subtitles.english: Eh? Kaiseki for two? You two went to eat kaiseki in a private room? What?!

subtitles.original: 早い早い、もう早い。まだ話すね。待って。全然...
subtitles.english: Too fast, too fast. It's too soon. I'm still talking. Wait. Not yet...

subtitles.original: 全然ちょっと、あ、まあまあ、これからまだあるから。まだまだ。
subtitles.english: Not at all, wait... well, there's still more to come. Much more.

subtitles.original: あのね、普段やったことなかったんだけどね、あの、私がちょっと服欲しくてさ、
subtitles.english: You know, it's not something I usually do, but I wanted some clothes,

subtitles.original: 裏でね、一緒にね、洋服を見たのね。見た見た見た見た。
subtitles.english: so we went looking for clothes together privately. We did, we did.

subtitles.original: 個人的に、あの、ちょっと嬉しかったことなんだけど、私がすごい好き、好きであってもあんまりね、自分で買ったことない洋服のね、お店があって、
subtitles.english: Personally, this was something that made me happy... there's a clothing store I really like, but I hadn't really bought anything there myself,

subtitles.original: それをね、ノエルに教えたら死ぬほど買い物してたの。
subtitles.english: and when I told Noel about it, she went on a crazy shopping spree.

subtitles.original: えー！ガチ？
subtitles.english: Whaaat! For real?!

subtitles.original: そこで、そうなの。え、エビフライのやつとか買ってたね。
subtitles.english: There, that's right. Oh, you bought that fried shrimp one.

subtitles.original: そう、色々買ってて。で、ふれあ、ちょっとここで初めて言うんだけど、
subtitles.english: Yeah, I bought various things. And, Flare, I'm saying this for the first time here,

subtitles.original: そのなんか買ったやつで、一種類買ったやつがあるんだけど、フレアには内緒で実はオソロっちで買ってて、
subtitles.english: of the things I bought, there's one item I bought as a matching set without telling Flare,

subtitles.original: 内緒で。ここで初めて言うんだけど。聞いてないよ。
subtitles.english: as a secret. I'm revealing it for the first time now. I haven't heard about this!

subtitles.original: え、なんだろう？何買ったんだろう？楽しみに待ってて。
subtitles.english: Oh, what could it be? What did she buy? Look forward to it.

subtitles.original: あー、それ気になりすぎるんだけど！ちょっと限界化してんだけど！ちょっと待って！
subtitles.english: Aaah, I'm so curious about that! I'm reaching my limit! Wait a minute!

subtitles.original: そんな...そんなお揃い...お揃い買ったんすか？！
subtitles.english: Such a... matching... you bought matching outfits?!

subtitles.original: いや、もうお揃いの話ね、したいなと思ってたんですけど、残念ながら限界化しちゃったんで、ここで終わりです。
subtitles.english: Well, I wanted to talk more about the matching outfits, but unfortunately, I've reached my limit, so that's it for now.

subtitles.original: ぎゃあああ！
subtitles.english: Gyaaaaa!

subtitles.original: ごめんなさい！もう、大事なとこ維持したかったのにー！
subtitles.english: I'm sorry! Oh, I wanted to keep going at the most important part!

subtitles.original: 今度はでも、三人でご飯行きましょう。
subtitles.english: But next time, let's all three of us go out for a meal.

subtitles.original: 行きましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: 一緒に行こう。約束だぞ。一緒にてぇてぇの一部になろう。
subtitles.english: Let's go together. It's a promise. Let's become a part of the 'te-te' together.

subtitles.original: 是非！お二人の隣で限界化させてください！
subtitles.english: By all means! Please let me be overwhelmed right beside you two!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、他のメンバーもいるということで。そうですね、たくさんいるみたいだね。
subtitles.english: Well, since there are other members waiting too. That's right, looks like there are many.

subtitles.original: はい、お暇します。
subtitles.english: Yes, we'll take our leave.

subtitles.original: 頑張ってください。今度濃厚なてぇてぇ話もっと用意してきてください！ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Good luck. Please bring more intense 'te-te' stories next time! Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: チョコ先生3周年おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Choco-sensei, happy 3rd anniversary!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: はい、ということで。あ、心臓に悪いわね。ふう。
subtitles.english: Yes, so... ah, that was bad for my heart. Phew.

subtitles.original: いや、すごい、お揃いの洋服を。しかも、しかも...
subtitles.english: Wow, matching clothes. And, and...

subtitles.original: フレア様が教えたお店でそんな、買うだなんて、てぇてぇすぎんだろ！
subtitles.english: To buy something at a store that Flare-sama recommended... that's just too 'te-te'!

subtitles.original: ということで、次のペア、準備の方よろしいでしょうか？
subtitles.english: So, is the next pair ready?

subtitles.original: あー、次のペアに行きたいと思います。
subtitles.english: Ah, I'd like to move on to the next pair.
